built_in_tools.name: read_file
built_in_tools.description: Read file contents from the workspace with line range support for examining code structure and implementation details

built_in_tools.name: edit_file
built_in_tools.description: Create new files or edit existing files with precise code changes using structured edit format

built_in_tools.name: search_replace
built_in_tools.description: Perform precise search and replace operations on files with context matching for targeted code modifications

built_in_tools.name: grep_search
built_in_tools.description: Search for patterns across files using regex to locate specific code patterns, imports, or usage

built_in_tools.name: codebase_search
built_in_tools.description: Semantic search across the codebase to find relevant components, functions, and implementation patterns

built_in_tools.name: list_dir
built_in_tools.description: List directory contents to understand project structure and locate files

built_in_tools.name: file_search
built_in_tools.description: Fuzzy search for files by name to quickly locate specific components or assets
